text:
We aren't having much luck with the weather
today.
It is really rainy here in Freiburg.

It is Easter weekend but we are out an exploring
and we want to show you the city.

One of my first impressions of Freiburg is
that it is such a great city to walk around
That's all we've been doing so far.

There are cobbled streets and it is also very
historic.

Thankfully, the weather has shifted dramatically
for the better.

Earlier we had been rained out, so we had
to head back into the hotel because it was

Now we're seeing a few patches of blue skies,
so we're going to keep exploring around Freiburg.
